title: Get a migration workflow
description: Retrieves a specific migration workflow from the BigQuery Migration Service.

objective.narrative: This sample is for developers who need to programmatically inspect the state of an existing BigQuery migration workflow. For example, they might want to build a monitoring dashboard or a script that checks if a workflow has completed successfully before triggering a subsequent action.

regionTags.name: bigquerymigration_v2_migrationservice_migrationworkflow_get
regionTags.title: Get a migration workflow
regionTags.description: Retrieves a specific migration workflow from the BigQuery Migration Service.
